articles.title: Is Cameron Smith set to join LIV after Open glory & Tiger's farewell? | The Back Page | Fox Sports - FOX SPORTS AUSTRALIA
articles.description: The Back Page team look at the British Open triumph of Cameron Smith, and whether they believe he will join the controversial, Greg Norman led LIV tournament...
